verses.verse: And there came <S%G2064><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> vials, <S%G5357><s%> and talked <S%G2980><s%> with me, saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, Come <S%G1204><s%> here; <S%G1204><s%> I will show <S%G1166><s%> to you the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> whore <S%G4204><s%> that sits <S%G2521><s%> on many <S%G4183><s%> waters: <S%G5204><s%>

With whom <S%G3739><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have committed <S%G4203><s%> fornication, <S%G4203><s%> and the inhabitants <S%G2730><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> have been made <S%G3182><s%> drunk <S%G3182><s%> with the wine <S%G3631><s%> of her fornication. <S%G4202><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> he carried <S%G667><s%> me away <S%G667><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness: <S%G2048><s%> and I saw <S%G1492><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> sit <S%G2521><s%> on a scarlet <S%G2847><s%> colored beast, <S%G2342><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of names <S%G3686><s%> of blasphemy, <S%G988><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

And the woman <S%G1135><s%> was arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in purple <S%G4209><s%> and scarlet <S%G2847><s%> color, <S%G4392><s%> and decked <S%G5558><s%> with gold <S%G5557><s%> and precious <S%G5093><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> and pearls, <S%G3135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> in her hand <S%G5495><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> of abominations <S%G946><s%> and filthiness <S%G168><s%> of her fornication: <S%G4202><s%>

And on her forehead <S%G3359><s%> was a name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> MYSTERY, <S%G3466><s%> BABYLON <S%G897><s%> THE GREAT, <S%G3173><s%> THE MOTHER <S%G3384><s%> OF HARLOTS <S%G4204><s%> AND ABOMINATIONS <S%G946><s%> OF THE EARTH. <S%G1093><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> drunken <S%G3184><s%> with the blood <S%G129><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> and with the blood <S%G129><s%> of the martyrs <S%G3144><s%> of Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> and when I saw <S%G1492><s%> her, I wondered <S%G2296><s%> with great <S%G3173><s%> admiration. <S%G2295><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to me, Why <S%G1302><s%> did you marvel? <S%G2296><s%> I will tell <S%G2046><s%> you the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the woman, <S%G1135><s%> and of the beast <S%G2342><s%> that carries <S%G941><s%> her, which <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and ten <S%G1176><s%> horns. <S%G2768><s%>

The beast <S%G2342><s%> that you saw <S%G1492><s%> was, and is not; and shall ascend <S%G305><s%> out of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit, and go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> perdition: <S%G684><s%> and they that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> shall wonder, <S%G2296><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> were not written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> from the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> when they behold <S%G991><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that was, and is not, and yet <S%G2539><s%> is.

And here <S%G5602><s%> is the mind <S%G3563><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> wisdom. <S%G4678><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> are seven <S%G2033><s%> mountains, <S%G3735><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G3699><s%> <S%G846><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> sits. <S%G2521><s%>

And there are seven <S%G2033><s%> kings: <S%G935><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> are fallen, <S%G4098><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> is, and the other <S%G243><s%> is not yet <S%G3768><s%> come; <S%G2064><s%> and when <S%G3752><s%> he comes, <S%G2064><s%> he must <S%G1163><s%> continue <S%G3306><s%> a short <S%G3641><s%> space.

And the beast <S%G2342><s%> that was, and is not, even <S%G2532><s%> he is the eighth, <S%G3590><s%> and is of the seven, <S%G2033><s%> and goes <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> perdition. <S%G684><s%>

And the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> are ten <S%G1176><s%> kings, <S%G935><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> have received <S%G2983><s%> no <S%G3768><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> as yet; <S%G3768><s%> but receive <S%G2983><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> as kings <S%G935><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> with the beast. <S%G2342><s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> mind, <S%G1106><s%> and shall give <S%G1239><s%> their power <S%G1411><s%> and strength <S%G1849><s%> to the beast. <S%G2342><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> shall make <S%G4170><s%> war <S%G4170><s%> with the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> and the Lamb <S%G721><s%> shall overcome <S%G3528><s%> them: for he is Lord <S%G2962><s%> of lords, <S%G2634><s%> and King <S%G935><s%> of kings: <S%G935><s%> and they that are with him are called, <S%G2822><s%> and chosen, <S%G1588><s%> and faithful. <S%G4103><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to me, The waters <S%G5204><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw, <S%G1492><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> the whore <S%G4204><s%> sits, <S%G2521><s%> are peoples, <S%G2992><s%> and multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> and nations, <S%G1484><s%> and tongues. <S%G1100><s%>

And the ten <S%G1176><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> on the beast, <S%G2342><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> shall hate <S%G3404><s%> the whore, <S%G4204><s%> and shall make <S%G4160><s%> her desolate <S%G2049><s%> and naked, <S%G1131><s%> and shall eat <S%G5315><s%> her flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and burn <S%G2618><s%> her with fire. <S%G4442><s%>

For God <S%G2316><s%> has put <S%G1325><s%> in their hearts <S%G2588><s%> to fulfill <S%G4160><s%> his will, <S%G1106><s%> and to agree, <S%G4160><s%> <S%G6639><s%> <S%G1106><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> their kingdom <S%G932><s%> to the beast, <S%G2342><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> shall be fulfilled. <S%G5055><s%>

And the woman <S%G1135><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> is that great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> reigns <S%G2192><s%> <S%G932><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>
